videoBanner.title: What is Vue Storefront
videoBanner.message: Vue Storefront is enormous but straightforward at the same time. Marc Backes created this fantastic video to explain to developers, what is Vue Storefront, is and how it works.

discordCTA.message: Find help, new ideas, new projects, and much more on our Discord server.
discordCTA.title: Join our Discord server

blog.title: Engage with us
blog.message: Read our incredible content in our developer focus blog.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.text: This page lists all existing and planned Vue Storefront integrations. Integrations with the Enterprise label are part of the {link} offering.

content.vsf: A Frontend as a Service that delivers custom storefronts at the fraction of cost and time, and with lightning-fast page loads to achieve better conversion rates and higher revenue.
content.sfui: A Vue.js design system and UI for Composable Commerce. Create stunning, mobile-first online stores with 50+ fully customizable components.

head.title: Knowledge quiz
head.ogtitle: Test your knowledge of Vue Storefront
head.ogdescription: Test your Vue Storefront knowledge for free. If you pass the test, you will be issued a diploma and a special badge on our Discord server.

userDetails.subheading: Want to get your dimploma by email? Enter your details below
userDetails.emailMessage: We will not share your email with anyone else or use it for marketing purposes
userDetails.emailSent: Your diploma has been sent to your email address

tryAgain.description: Unfortunately, you did not pass the test with the score of {score}%. You need at least {passing_score}% to pass, but you can try again as many times as you want. If you pass the test, you will be issued a diploma and a special badge on our Discord server.

head.title: Quiz results
head.ogtitle: See my Vue Storefront knowledge test results

diploma.line_3: {test} knowledge quiz with the score of {score}%

result.loginTitle: Login to Discord to receive a badge

social.title: Follow us
social.message: Check our social medias, and connect directly to Vue Storefront development process.

commerce.text: Vue Storefront provides a frontend for your headless eCommerce platform. Connect easily with a wide range of solutions, and accelerate frontend development.
commerce.title: Commerce Integrations

cms.text: CMSs are platforms where content creators’ and developers’ paths cross, so they require a great integration to make sure tasks can be handed over smoothly. Integrating Vue Storefront with a CMS gets you no code content creation capabilities.
cms.title: CMS Integrations

payment.text: A smooth payment experience is a must for a good conversion rate. On the other hand, such integrations require specific knowledge, a lot of attention to detail, and managing edge cases. Accelerate your frontend development with our payment integrations.
payment.title: Payment Integrations

reviews.text: All development efforts should lead to a better customer experience. The best way to get to know what your customers think about your site is through Review Solutions, that's why we provide such integration.
reviews.title: Reviews Integrations

auth.text: Security is the cornerstone of all enterprise eCommerce projects. With our out-of-the-box integration, so you can easily set up authentication and authorization processes.
auth.title: Auth Integrations

cache.text: Cache allows you to greatly improve the second load of a certain page and as such improves the User Experience.
cache.title: Cache Integrations

search.text: Visitors who get a great search experience are 70% more likely to buy your products. Integrate with one of our Search providers to cut time on development and increase conversion rates.
search.title: Search Integrations
